entry.name: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.caption: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and ((app eq incomplete) or (app eq insufficient-data) or (app eq not-applicable) or (action eq deny) or (action eq drop))
entry.description: Optional: What is trying to access internal servers. Not scheduled.

entry.name: Outbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.caption: Outbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and ((app eq incomplete) or (app eq insufficient-data) or (app eq not-applicable) or (action eq deny) or (action eq drop))
entry.description: Optional: What is trying to access Internet servers. Not scheduled.

entry.name: Inbound Used Rules
entry.caption: Inbound Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Internal Used Rules
entry.caption: Internal Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Outbound Used Rules
entry.caption: Outbound Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Used Rules
entry.caption: Used Rules
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Outbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Outbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Internal Network Downloading Files From the Internet

entry.name: Inbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Internet Clients Uploading Files to your network

entry.name: Internal File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Internal File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Files uploaded Internal to Internal

entry.name: Inbound Source Countries
entry.caption: Inbound Source Countries
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Source Countries initiating successful connections

entry.name: Inbound Source Countries-App
entry.caption: Inbound Source Countries-App
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Source Countries initiating successful connections to your network and the Apps they are using

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses allow into your network from the Internet

entry.name: Inbound Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses successfully denied from entering your network

entry.name: Internal Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Viruses
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses allow into your network from your network (lateral movement).

entry.name: Internal Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Internal Denied Viruses
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses successfully denied from traveling laterally

entry.name: Inbound Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Inbound Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities.

entry.name: Internal Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Internal Rules wThreat
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and ((direction eq server-to-client) or (direction eq client-to-server)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internal Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities.

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Spyware allowed in from the Internet

entry.name: Inbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Spyware successfully blocked from entering your network

entry.name: Internal Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Spyware allowed laterally

entry.name: Internal Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Internal Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) ) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Spyware successfully denied laterally. Still investigate for possible infection.

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Client on the internet sending traffic to your network intended to exploit a vulnerability on your network.

entry.name: Inbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Client on the internet sending traffic to your network intended to exploit a vulnerability on your network. This was blocked.

entry.name: Internal Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to your network intended to exploit a vulnerability on your network. Can indicate patching is needed on the client side.

entry.name: Internal Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Internal Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to your network intended to exploit a vulnerability on your network. Can indicate patching is needed on the client side. This was blocked.

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Client on the Internet sending traffic to your network. Your reply is intended to exploit a vulnerability on the Internet client.

entry.name: Inbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Client on the Internet sending traffic to your network. Your response is intended to exploit a vulnerability the Internet server. Can indicate patching is needed on the client side.

entry.name: Internal Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) ) or ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to your network. Your reply is intended to exploit a vulnerability on the client. Can indicate patching is needed on the server side.

entry.name: Internal Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Internal Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to your network. Your response is intended to exploit a vulnerability on the client. Can indicate patching is needed on the server side.

entry.name: Inbound URLs by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound URLs by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq continue) or (action eq override))
entry.description: URLs allowed into the network from the Internet. Long report. Schedule if necessary.

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Outbound Browser-based applications by URL Category and Application

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Outbound Browser-based applications by URL Category and Application. Long report. Do Not Schedule unless necessary.

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Outbound non-browser-based applications. Long report. Do Not Schedule unless necessary.

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps-Location
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Outbound Browser-based applications by URL Category

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Location
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Outbound to Internet Non-browser-based Applications, their URL Category and destination country.

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Outbound Applications by Protocol, Port. Also shows whether port is non-standard. Certain apps, like FTP, will show non-standard in error.

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Outbound Browser-based applications by URL Category, Protocol, Port and whether port is non-standard. Certain apps, like FTP, will show non-standard in error.

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Outbound to Internet non-browser-based applications

entry.name: Outbound Unknown Apps Detailed
entry.caption: Outbound Unknown Apps Detailed
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (( app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Outbound to Internet Unknown Applications, this application type should be blocked. Assess first for any that are necessary.

entry.name: Outbound Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Outbound Unknown Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (( app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Outbound to Internet Unknown Applications. This application type should be blocked. Assess for necessary traffic first.

entry.name: Inbound Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Inbound Unknown Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and ((app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Inbound from Internet, Unknown applications. This application type should be blocked. Assess for any necessary traffic first.

entry.name: Internal Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Internal Unknown Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (( app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Internal Unknown Applications. This application type should be blocked. Assess for necessary traffic first.

entry.name: Inbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Files downloaded to the Internet by an Internet client. Files are leaving your network.

entry.name: Inbound File DNLD by Rule-Detail
entry.caption: Inbound File DNLD by Rule-Detail
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (srcloc neq 'US')
entry.description: Files downloaded to the Internet by an Internet client. Files are leaving your network. This lists IPs and can be long.

entry.name: Internal File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Internal File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet))) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Files downloaded laterally on your internal network.

entry.name: Outbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Outbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Files Uploaded to the Internet by an Internal client. Files are leaving your network.

entry.name: Outbound Dest Countries
entry.caption: Outbound Dest Countries
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: What countries your traffic is going to

entry.name: Outbound Dest Countries-Apps
entry.caption: Outbound Dest Countries-Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (dstloc neq 'US') and (app neq dns)
entry.description: What countries your traffic (by application) are going to. DNS and United States are excluded.

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst enq outside) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses leaving your network

entry.name: Outbound Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses successfully denied from leaving your network

entry.name: Outbound Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Outbound Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst enq outside) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Outbound Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities.

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (subtype eq spyware)
entry.description: Spyware allowed to leave your network

entry.name: Outbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and (subtype eq spyware)
entry.description: Spyware successfully blocked from leaving your network

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to the Internet intended to exploit a vulnerability on the Internet server. Can indicate patching is needed on the client side.

entry.name: Outbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to the Internet intended to exploit a vulnerability on the Internet server. Can indicate patching is needed on the client side. This was blocked.

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Client on the Internet sending traffic to your network. Your response is intended to exploit a vulnerability on the Internet client. Can indicate patching is needed on the server side.

entry.name: Outbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to the Internet. The Internet servers response is intended to exploit a vulnerability on the client. Verify your server is no affected by this vulnerability. This was blocked.

entry.name: Outbound URL Cats Quest PANDB
entry.caption: Outbound URL Cats Quest PANDB
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq parked) or (category eq phishing) or (category eq proxy-avoidance-and-anonymizers) or (category eq questionable))
entry.description: Categories recommended to block that are still being permitted.

entry.name: Outbound URL Cats Unknown
entry.caption: Outbound URL Cats Unknown
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst eq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (category eq unknown)
entry.description: URLs that are unknown. This entire category should be denied. Assess if any are necessary first.

entry.name: Internal URLs
entry.caption: Internal URLs
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: All URLs used internally. Can be a long report. Only schedule if needed.

entry.name: Wildfire malicious verdicts
entry.caption: Wildfire malicious verdicts
entry.query: (app neq smtp) and (category neq benign)
entry.description: Files uploaded or downloaded that were later found to be malicious. This is a summary. Act on real-time email.

entry.name: Wildfire verdicts SMTP
entry.caption: Wildfire verdicts SMTP
entry.query: (app eq smtp) and (category neq benign)
entry.description: Links sent from emails found to be malicious.

entry.name: Clients sinkholed
entry.caption: Clients sinkholed
entry.query: (rule eq 'DNS Sinkhole Block')

entry.name: Inbound Apps
entry.caption: Inbound Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Applications used Inbound from the Internet

entry.name: Internal Apps
entry.caption: Internal Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Applications used Internally

entry.name: Inbound Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Inbound Applications by IP. Long report. Do Not Schedule unless necessary.

entry.name: Internal Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Internal Apps-IPs
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet))) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Internal Applications by IP Address. Long report. Do not schedule unless necessary.

entry.name: Inbound Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Inbound Applications by Protocol, Port. Also shows whether port is non-standard. Certain apps, like FTP, will show non-standard in error.

entry.name: Internal Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Internal Apps-Ports
entry.query: (((zone.src neq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Internal Applications by Protocol, Port. Also shows whether port is non-standard. Certain apps, like FTP, will show non-standard in error.

entry.name: Inbound Apps-Location
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src eq internet) and (zone.dst neq internet)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Inbound Applications by Source Country

entry.name: Host-visit malicious sites plus
entry.caption: Host-visit malicious sites plus
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)

entry.name: Hosts visit malicious sites
entry.caption: Hosts visit malicious sites
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)

entry.name: Hosts visit questionable sites
entry.caption: Hosts visit questionable sites
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) and (category eq parked) and (category eq questionable) and (category eq unknown)

entry.name: Host-visit quest sites plus
entry.caption: Host-visit quest sites plus
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) and (category eq parked) and (category eq questionable) and (category eq unknown)

entry.name: Exception-AV
entry.description: Use this profile for rules needing modifications to the standard

ip.description: DROP (Don't Route Or Peer) and EDROP are advisory "drop all traffic" lists, consisting of stolen 'hijacked' netblocks and netblocks controlled entirely by criminals and professional spammers. See http://www.spamhaus.org/drop/

DROP (Don't Route Or Peer) and EDROP are advisory "drop all traffic" lists, consisting of stolen 'hijacked' netblocks and netblocks controlled entirely by criminals and professional spammers. See http://www.spamhaus.org/drop/
The OpenBL.org project (formerly known as the SSH blacklist) is about detecting, logging and reporting bruteforce attacks. See http://www.openbl.org/

entry.name: Emerging Threats Known Compromised Hosts List

ip.description: DShield.org Recommended Block List. See http://feeds.dshield.org/block.txt
SSLBL 30 days block list. See https://sslbl.abuse.ch/blacklist/
From Emerging Threats RBN rules. See http://doc.emergingthreats.net/bin/view/Main/RussianBusinessNetwork

entry.name: NO-Decrypt Rule
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.
